body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
There is an issue in spark-rapids that needs the JNI of `replace_nans` in cuDF: https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6276

This is **not** a blocker of https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/5320.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
Add any other context, code examples, or references to existing implementations about the feature request here.

comments.body: This issue has been labeled `inactive-30d` due to no recent activity in the past 30 days. Please close this issue if no further response or action is needed. Otherwise, please respond with a comment indicating any updates or changes to the original issue and/or confirm this issue still needs to be addressed. This issue will be labeled `inactive-90d` if there is no activity in the next 60 days.

title: [FEA] Add JNI for `replace_nans`
